TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MdbDataFileEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor

summary.span: 提供用于选择 Microsoft Access 数据库文件的设计时用户界面。

span.span: Provides a design-time user interface for selecting a Microsoft Access database file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时使用对象来选择和编辑MicrosoftAccess数据库文件(.mdb)的url,然后将该url分配给控件属性。An object is used at design time to select and edit a URL for a Microsoft Access database file (.mdb), and then assign the URL to a control property. 例如, 控件在设计时使用类来设置属性的值。For example, the control uses the class at design time to set the value of the property. 使用特性将与属性相关联。Use the attribute to associate the with a property. 在设计图面上编辑关联的属性时, 设计器宿主将调用方法。When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the method. 方法使用方法, 该方法依次显示用于选择 URL 的用户界面, 然后返回用户选择的 url。The method uses the method, which in turn displays a user interface for selecting the URL, and then returns the URL that is selected by the user. 方法指示用户界面的显示样式。The method indicates the display style of the user interface. 从派生类 , 以定义 Access 数据库 URL 属性的自定义编辑器。Derive a class from the to define a custom editor for an Access database URL property. 例如, 派生类可以重写方法, 然后使用自定义或值调用方法。For example, a derived class can override the method, and then call the method with a custom or value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类的实例与自定义控件内包含的属性相关联。The following code example demonstrates how to associate an instance of the class with a property that is contained within a custom control. 在设计图面上编辑控件属性时, 类提供用户界面, 以便为属性值选择和编辑 Access 数据库文件名。When you edit the control property on the design surface, the class provides the user interface to select and edit an Access database file name for the property value. [!code-csharp[WebDesigner.MdbDataFileEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebDesigner.MdbDataFileEditor/CS/simplecontrolwithfilename.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebDesigner.MdbDataFileEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebDesigner.MdbDataFileEditor/VB/simplecontrolwithfilename.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Caption As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要在选择对话框中显示的标题。

span.span: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog box.

value.span: 要在选择对话框中显示的标题文本。

span.span: The caption text to display on the selection dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串由方法在调用方法时使用, 此方法在设计时向用户显示 URL 选择对话框。 The string is used by the method when calling the method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取编辑器的 URL 筛选选项，用于对 URL 选择对话框中出现的项进行筛选。

span.span: Gets the URL filter options for the editor, which is used to filter the items that appear in the URL selection dialog box.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示对话框的一个或多个 URL 筛选选项。

span.span: A string that represents one or more URL filter options for the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性由方法在调用方法时使用, 此方法在设计时向用户显示 URL 选择对话框。The property is used by the method when calling the method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time. 属性默认值表示对话框的两个 URL 筛选器: 一个用于 Microsoft Access 数据库文件 (\* .mdb), 另一个用于所有文件 (\*.\*)。 The property default value indicates two URL filters for the dialog box: one for Microsoft Access database files (\*.mdb) and another for all files (\*.\*). 若要指定自定义筛选器字符串, 请从类派生一个类, 并重写属性以返回自定义筛选器字符串。To specify a custom filter string, derive a class from the class and override the property to return the custom filter string. 筛选器字符串包含一个或多个筛选选项。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每个筛选器选项都包含筛选器的说明, 后跟竖线 (|) 和筛选器模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 不同筛选选项的字符串用竖线分隔。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 下面是包含两个筛选器选项的筛选器字符串的示例:The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`Microsoft Access Databases (*.mdb)|*.mdb|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Microsoft Access Databases (*.mdb)|*.mdb|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 您可以通过用分号分隔筛选器模式, 在筛选器选项中指定多个筛选器模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 下面是一个筛选器字符串的示例, 其中第一个筛选器选项指定了两个筛选器模式:The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies two filter patterns: "`Custom Database Files (*.db1; *.db2)|*.db1;*.db2|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Custom Database Files (*.db1; *.db2)|*.db1;*.db2|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
